184167464.review:
I LOVE THIS GAME I LOVE THIS GAME I LOVE THIS GAME
The simplicity of only having 2 possible moves and one hit being all it takes makes this a pulse pounding heart wrenching tongue tying mind melting skin crawling white knuckle gripping the controller sweating bullets and gritting my teeth kind of experience.

183766398.review: This game was made as an inside joke, so it's weird to say it's unironically the future of fighting games. The 2-button system means that a new player can finish onboarding in less than 10 minutes, and suddenly they're having intense toe-to-toe matches with experienced players. This includes even people like my parents, who are both mid-50s yet took to the game immediately and ask to play it on special occasions. We NEED more games like this.
